scripts.git: git add . && echo 'do a git publish after comment.' && git commit -m $npm_config_m
scripts.aaa: node -e "const execSync = require('child_process').execSync;let code = execSync('git status');execSync('git push');console.log(code);" && npm run date && npm run xxx && npm run out --foo=frank
scripts.go2: NODE_XX = node -e "()=> { const dateTime = require('moment')().format('YYYYMMDD');console.log(dateTime); return dateTime}" && echo $NODE_XX
scripts.minor-release2: npm version minor && git add . && git commit --m 'auto updates' && git push --follow-tags
scripts.go5: node -e "const mssg = 'hello world'; require('child_process').execSync('git add . && git commit -m \"' + mssg + '\"', { stdio:[0, 1, 2] })"
